Data Cleaning

```{r}
# Calculate missing values percentage
retail_null <- round(100 * colSums(is.na(retail)) / nrow(retail), 2)

# Display result
retail_null
```

```{r}
# Remove rows with any missing values
retail_clean <- na.omit(retail)

# Check the structure of the cleaned dataset
str(retail_clean)
```
